## ortho variable

Creates a 4x4 matrix orthographic projection matrix and writes result to `out`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ortho: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, left: number, right: number, bottom: number, top: number, near: number, far: number) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
